read

Class ReadWigleWifi

  • java.lang.Object
    • read.ReadCsv<CsvFile>
      • read.ReadWigleWifi
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReadFile<WigleWifiLine>

    public class ReadWigleWifi
extends ReadCsv<CsvFile>
implements ReadFile<WigleWifiLine>
    This class extends ReadCsv and implements @see ReadFile. This class reads a file and input into an array list the object @see CsvFile. This class use the API commons-csv @see https://commons.apache.org/proper/commons-csv/. This class implements @see ReadFile.
    Author:
    Orel and Samuel.
    See Also:
    for more informations about how to run with the api.

        public void readBuffer()
        This method reads the file from @see ReadFolder and put into an array list the data we need. We use here the API commons-csv. Attention : tu run with the API you need to import him into the project @see README.
